name: Cherry Chase (sabu_jr)
description:
Cherry Chase is a fun and addictive arcade-style game in which players control a jumping fox. The objective of the game is to guide the fox through the air using the arrow keys or A/S keys, collecting as many cherries as possible while avoiding obstacles such as bats and eagles. The game features simple, 8bit-style graphics and a catchy soundtrack. Players can also compete for high scores.

Controls
  • A/S or left arrow/right arrow - movement
  • Space - jump
Credit

Programming and Development done by myself.
